title: Microsoft's $25 Xbox Wireless Adapter for Windows 10 is now shipping to retailers worldwide
text:
Microsoft's $25 Xbox Wireless Adapter for Windows 10 is now shipping to retailers worldwide 
Published By: Neowin.net - Today 
Microsoft announced that they have begun globally shipping the Wireless Adapter for Windows10 to retailers. The $25 dongle will allow up to ...
